meta.prompt: A breathtaking, ultra high-resolution (8K) macro photograph of a small Kodama forest spirit inspired by Studio Ghibli, standing on a mossy forest floor. This Kodama has the whimsical body shape of a classic Kodama, but its skin resembles the surface of a ripe strawberry—vivid red with tiny yellow seeds and a glossy texture. On top of its head, a small cluster of fresh green leaves forms a leafy crown, reminiscent of a strawberry stem. The Kodama’s large, expressive, dark eyes gaze curiously at the viewer, radiating innocence and wonder. Dewdrops glisten on the vibrant green moss and miniature mushrooms surround the Kodama, enhancing the sense of magical realism. Soft, ethereal rays of sunlight filter through lush, out-of-focus foliage in the background, creating a dreamy, enchanting atmosphere. The photo is hyper-detailed, with shallow depth of field and beautiful bokeh, capturing every tiny detail of the Kodama’s strawberry-textured skin, the moss, and the natural environment. The mood is whimsical, mysterious, and enchanting, evoking the spirit of classic Ghibli animation.
